name: Bellum Internecinum
description:
Bellum Internecinum is a Galaga style shot-em-up game in which the player has to destroy as many aliens as possible.

Aliens appears in rows of 5 and moves horizontally on the screen. Now and then one or more aliens break formation and makes suicidal attack runs towards the player. As the game progresses the aliens moves faster, makes more suicidal attack runs and fires more missiles at the player. Every time the players ship takes a hit a small part of it is destroyed this continues until the ship is completely destroyed. After a few waves of aliens bonus items starts to appear, these can increase the speed of the ship, give better/faster ammo and rebuild part of the ship.

shot.caption: There is not much left of my ship now
